title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Context-Based Online English Oral Communication Training

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level understanding of basic English grammar and vocabulary
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can improve spoken English communication skills by over 30% through role-play reflecting real classroom situations
Learners can achieve clear communication by selecting appropriate vocabulary and utilizing grammatical structures during contextualized task performance
Learners can improve oral presentation skills (pronunciation, intonation, fluency) through peer and self-assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
